statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_id, email, password_hash FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, password_hash FROM customer_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, email DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, customer_name FROM customer_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND customer_name <> 'Admin' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM login_credentials ORDER BY login_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2 AND customer_password = 'password123';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3 OR customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers LEFT JOIN login_credentials ON customers.customer_id = login_credentials.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, login_credentials.username FROM customers INNER JOIN login_credentials ON customers.customer_id = login_credentials.customer_id ORDER BY customers.customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM login_credentials;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, balance FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, account_type, balance FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, account_type, balance FROM customers JOIN accounts ON customers.customer_id = accounts.customer_id WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE state = 'New York' ORDER BY address_id ASC;
SELECT orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM account_details ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT customer_id, account_type, balance FROM account_details ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_credentials WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT customer_id, action, timestamp FROM security_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
